name: NearSt
slogan: Getting people back into high street shops
description:
NearSt's technology helps you search for a product and see which stores have it in stock nearby, directly in places like Google.

Our retail technology platform - NearLIVE - makes this possible by connecting the products stocked in high street shops directly into the places on the web where customers are searching. We do this using real-time local inventory technology - our unique single view of exactly who stocks what, where, and when. By connecting our real-time local inventory data to the sites, apps and services already used by shoppers we’re truly making buying local faster and easier than buying online.

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description:
The Role

We’re looking for a high-energy, driven sales executive to join our rapidly growing partnerships team. You’ll be working at the very front of the business, communicating with shops on a daily basis from our Shoreditch-based HQ, and getting them to join NearSt.

You’ll help make the complexities of technology simple for shopkeepers who are keen to boost footfall in their stores, and in doing so have a hugely positive impact on both their business and ours.

Whether this is your first role, or you’re looking to move into sales from another field, we’re looking for someone who’s keen to learn. As a fast growing startup we’re rapidly learning and evolving ourselves, and will look to you to do the same.

Sound interesting? Come join us and help shape the future of our high streets.

jobs.title: Customer Success Executive
jobs.description:
Who We Are

We're a retail technology company on a mission to get people back into high street shops. Our platform drives footfall by making in-store products visible to the millions of people searching for them nearby. Google are already using our Real-Time Local Inventory technology to help people search for products locally, and that’s just the start. Our goal is to connect every product, in every shop, on every high street to the web so it’s easier to find something nearby than buy it online.


We see an incredibly bright path ahead for retail and have grand plans for making NearSt a central part of this future (hear our CEO talk about it in our Next Web keynote). Sound interesting? Come join us and help shape the future of our high streets.


About The Role

We’re looking for a highly personable, driven Customer Success Executive to join our Partnerships team and help deliver incredible experiences for the rapidly growing number of shops using our technology.

This year we have some serious growth goals to hit, and you’ll play an essential role in making sure that the shops who join us not only stay, but turn into advocates for NearSt. You’ll be involved from the moment a shop has decided to join us, picking up the baton from our shop sales team. This spans everything from delivering a fantastic on-boarding experience through to always seeking ways to show more value to our shopkeepers.

You will be an integral part of the Partnerships team at a time of massive growth for us, and you’ll have loads of opportunity to take on responsibility and grow your career.

Whether this is your first role or you’re moving into Customer Success from another industry, we’re most interested in people who are personable and eager to learn. As a fast growing startup we’re rapidly learning and evolving ourselves, and will look to you to do the same.

If you’re excited about the future of the high street and playing an important role in building it, get in touch!
